summary.span: 表示 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A本身不的複合幾何，但可由類別來儲存物件。A is not itself a composite geometry, but is used by the class to store objects. ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreGeometryObjectElements**oneOrMoreGeometryObjectElements* 一或多個宣告使用物件元素語法的物件。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合搜尋開始第一，向前並在最後一個結束。The collection is searched forward starting at the first and ending at the last . 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間成正比的值。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of . 亦即，這個方法是 O (*n*) 運算，其中*n*等於。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is equal to . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling .
